verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you have <S%H6148>become<s%> <S%H6148>surety<s%> for your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> Have <S%H8628>given<s%> a <S%H3709>pledge<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger,<s%>
[If] you have been <S%H3369>snared<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> Have been <S%H3920>caught<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%>

<S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H645>then,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5337>yourself;<s%> <S%H3588>Since<s%> you have <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H7511>humble<s%> yourself, and <S%H7292>importune<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
Do not <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to your <S%H6079>eyelids;<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> <S%H5337>yourself<s%> like a <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> from [the hunter's] <S%H3027>hand,<s%> And like a <S%H6833>bird<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler.<s%>
<S%H1980>Go<s%> to the <S%H5244>ant,<s%> O <S%H6102>sluggard,<s%> <S%H7200>Observe<s%> her ways and be <S%H2449>wise,<s%>
<S%H834>Which,<s%> <S%H369>having<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7101>chief,<s%> <S%H7860>Officer<s%> or <S%H4910>ruler,<s%>
<S%H3559>Prepares<s%> her <S%H3899>food<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer,<s%> [And] <S%H103>gathers<s%> her <S%H3978>provision<s%> in the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>
<S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> O <S%H6102>sluggard<s%>? <S%H4970>When<s%> will you <S%H6965>arise<s%> from your <S%H8142>sleep<s%>?
"A <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber,<s%> A <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>rest<s%>" â€“
And your <S%H7389>poverty<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> in like a <S%H1980>vagabond,<s%> And your <S%H4270>need<s%> like an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
A <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H120>person,<s%> a <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> Is the one who <S%H1980>walks<s%> with a <S%H6143>false<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%>
Who <S%H7169>winks<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> who <S%H9267>signals<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> Who <S%H3384>points<s%> with his <S%H676>fingers;<s%>
Who [with] <S%H8419>perversity<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H9177>devises<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H3605>continually,<s%> <S%H6256><s%> Who <S%H7971>spreads<s%> <S%H4066>strife.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> his <S%H343>calamity<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly;<s%> <S%H6621>Instantly<s%> he will be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4832>healing.<s%>
<S%H1992>There<s%> are <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8337>things<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8130>hates,<s%> Yes, <S%H7651>seven<s%> which are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to Him:
<S%H7311>Haughty<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> And <S%H3027>hands<s%> that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%>
A <S%H3820>heart<s%> that <S%H9177>devises<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>plans,<s%> <S%H7272>Feet<s%> that <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H4116>rapidly<s%> to <S%H9567>evil,<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> [who] <S%H6315>utters<s%> <S%H3577>lies,<s%> And one who <S%H7971>spreads<s%> <S%H4090>strife<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5341>observe<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of your father, And do not <S%H1>forsake<s%> the <S%H5203>teaching<s%> of your <S%H8451>mother;<s%>
<S%H7194>Bind<s%> them <S%H8548>continually<s%> on your <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H6029>Tie<s%> them <S%H5921>around<s%> your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>

When you <S%H1980>walk<s%> about, they will <S%H5148>guide<s%> you; When you <S%H7901>sleep,<s%> they will <S%H8104>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you; And when you <S%H9516>awake,<s%> they will <S%H7878>talk<s%> to you.

For the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp,<s%> and the <S%H8451>teaching<s%> is <S%H216>light;<s%> And <S%H9640>reproofs<s%> for <S%H4148>discipline<s%> are the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%>
To <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from the <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> From the <S%H9142>smooth<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H5237>adulteress.<s%>
Do not <S%H2530>desire<s%> her <S%H3308>beauty<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> let her <S%H3947>catch<s%> you with her <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>

For on <S%H1157>account<s%> of a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> [one is reduced] to a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> And an <S%H802>adulteress<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H6679>hunts<s%> for the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2846>take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> And his <S%H899>clothes<s%> not be <S%H8313>burned<s%>?
<S%H518>Or<s%> can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> on hot <S%H1513>coals,<s%> And his <S%H7272>feet<s%> not be <S%H3554>scorched<s%>?
<S%H3651>So<s%> is the one who <S%H935>goes<s%> in to his neighbor's <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H3605>Whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> her will not <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
Men do not <S%H936>despise<s%> a <S%H1590>thief<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H1589>steals<s%> To <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H7456>hungry;<s%>
But when he is <S%H4672>found,<s%> he must <S%H9608>repay<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold;<s%> He must <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The one who <S%H5003>commits<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> is <S%H2638>lacking<s%> <S%H3820>sense;<s%> He who would <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> it.
<S%H5061>Wounds<s%> and <S%H7036>disgrace<s%> he will <S%H4672>find,<s%> And his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> will not be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out.
For <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H2534>enrages<s%> a <S%H1397>man,<s%> And he will not <S%H2550>spare<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance.<s%>

He will not <S%H5375>accept<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3724>ransom,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will he be <S%H14>content<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> you <S%H7235>give<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7810>gifts.<s%>
